title: 設定GitHub SSH金鑰
content:
Setup
根據email創建一個新的SSH金鑰

ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -C "your_email@example.com"

開啟ssh-agent，將私鑰加入到ssh-agent\

eval "$(ssh-agent -s)"ssh-add -K ~/.ssh/id_rsa


上傳公鑰，並到GitHub上上傳SSH key

cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub GitHub Keys Settings

ssh連接GitHub SSH

ssh -T git@github.com
Resources
設定 Github SSH 金鑰 feat. Github SSH、HTTPS 的差異
How to clone, push, and pull with git (beginners GitHub tutorial)

title: Vue Basic Syntax
content:
Vue Basic SyntaxDirectives
Event Binding: v-on or shorthand @click
Attribute Binding: v-bind or shorthand :attribute
Examples: :input, :input.enter, :key


Two-Way Binding: v-model
Conditional Rendering:
v-if
v-else-if
v-else
v-show


List Rendering: v-for
Example: v-for="goal in goals"



Communication Between Components
Props: Pass data from parent to child
Emits: Send events from child to parent
